definition: to support/to prop up/to push or move with a pole/to maintain/to open or unfurl/to fill to bursting point/brace/stay/support
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to make oneself do sth in spite of adversity, pain etc
to keep up appearances/to put up a front
to keep up appearances/to put up a front
having nothing better to do/see 吃飽撐著|吃饱撑着
pinyin: chi1 bao3 le5 fan4 cheng1 de5

definition: to use all one's willpower (to do sth)/to hang in there

sentences.english: The concept for the prototype is an upscaled upside down umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 該設計的概念是一個撐開來的倒傘形。

sentences.english: If I have to not give up, you will not accompany me until the heavens down.
sentences.chinese: 如果我一直堅持不放棄，你會不會陪我撐到天塌下去。

sentences.english: He poled the raft down the river.
We pigged out on potato chips and cookies until our bellies ached.
sentences.chinese: 大喫薯條和曲奇，喫到肚子撐到痛爲止。

sentences.english: Dream searching? Dash a long boat pole.
Thick glass supported by solid chrome rings.
sentences.chinese: 厚玻璃由堅固的烙環作撐腳。

sentences.english: According to records, in 554 AD Ireland will hold across the River game.
sentences.chinese: 據記載，公元554年愛爾蘭就有撐越過河的遊戲。

sentences.english: Attach the stand to the book using screws.
sentences.chinese: 用螺絲釘把鞋撐固定在書本上。

sentences.english: Two arms curving and inspiration, supporting and expiration.
sentences.chinese: 兩臂彎曲時吸氣，撐直時呼氣。

sentences.english: He lifted the bike off its stand and kick -started it.
sentences.chinese: 他將摩托車撐腳架往上一提，開始蹬車啓動。

sentences.english: This is called bracketing the pain.
sentences.chinese: 這被叫做底層撐託痛苦。

sentences.english: Day and all night to soak in the title the sea, have been head of the stretch.
sentences.chinese: 整日整夜地泡在題海中，腦袋都被撐大了。

sentences.english: If I had to make a call, I'd say he's won't last the year.
sentences.chinese: 如果有機會，我會在電話裏提醒他撐不過今年。

sentences.english: Bricks and mortar will not stay.
I see many students taking pre-medical courses with joyless tenacity.
sentences.chinese: 我見過許多上醫科預備課程的學生趣味索然地苦撐。

definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
enough (sufficient)/enough (too much)/(coll.) (before adj.) really/(coll.) to reach by stretching out
to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
to persevere with/to persist in/to insist on
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to lean against/to rely on/on the basis of/no matter (how, what etc)/proof
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
